name: Swap Patients
description: Notification when two patients exchange bed assignments or room locations
businessPurpose: Notify systems when two patients exchange bed assignments to maintain accurate location tracking and bed management
timing: Sent when the decision is made to swap two patients between their current locations
realWorldScenarios: ICU bed optimization - moving stable patient to allow critical patient better access
Room preference accommodation - patient requests private room, swap with willing patient
Infection control - isolating patient by swapping with patient in isolation-capable room
Equipment access - moving patient closer to specialized medical equipment
Family convenience - patient swap to accommodate visiting family needs
Clinical care optimization - grouping patients by acuity level or care team

generationRules.PV1.3: Patient A new location (first patient set)
Patient B new location (second patient set)
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate patient identification and location data critical for patient safety
